Package wordquizzle.wqserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Acceptor
    the Acceptor class implements the TCP connection acceptor as a Singleton.
    AddFriendHandler
    The AddFriendHandler class handles "add friend" requests.
    Challenge
    The Challenge class implements the match between two players.
    ChallengedMessageHandler
    The ChallengedMessageHandler handles the messages a user sends after receiving a challenge request
    ChallengeIssuedMessageHandler
    The ChallengeIssuedMessageHandler handles the messages a user sends while waiting for a challenge request to be accepted.
    CommandHandler
    The CommandHandler abstract class describes how to handle commands sent by an user
    Database
    The Database class implements the server Database as a Singleton
    DefaultMessageHandler
    The DefaultMessageHandler handles the messages a client sends before logging in.
    EventHandler
    The EventHandler class implements the parsing and dispatching of the various messages to the appropriate MessageHandler.
    FriendListHandler
    The FriendListHandler class handles "show friendlist" requests.
    InGameMessageHandler
    The InGameMessageHandler handles the message a client sends during a WordQuizzle game.
    IssueChallengeHandler
    The IssueChallengehandler class handles challenge requests.
    LeaderboardHandler
    The LeaderboardHandler class handles "show leaderboard" requests.
    LoggedInMessageHandler
    The LoggedInMessageHandler handles the messages a user sends after logging in.
    LoginHandler
    The LoginHandler class handles login requests.
    LogoutHandler
    The LogoutHandler class handles logout requests.
    MessageHandler
    The MessageHandler abstract class describes how to handle the messages received by the user given the state the user is in.
    Reactor
    The Reactor class implements a sort of Reactor pattern for handling reads and writes on a stream socket.
    RegisterServerHandler  
    ScoreHandler
    The ScoreHandler class handles "show score" requests.
    SendWordCommandHandler
    The SendWordCommandHandler class handles the received translations sent by the players.
    User
    The User class describes a WordQuizzle user.
    User.UserJsonDeserializer
    User class JSON deserializer.
    User.UserJsonSerializer
    User class JSON serializer.
    WQServer  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Database.UserNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when the requested user doesn't exist inside the database.
    User.AlreadyFriendsException
    Runtime exception thrown when the two users are already friends.
    User.NoHandlerAssignedException  
    User.SelfFriendException
